div.p: T.M. and L.N. conceptualized the study, designed the methodology, made formal data analysis and investigation, and wrote the initial draft; S.M., D.N., P.P.C., A.S., and C.N. validated the data, wrote parts of the manuscript and reviewed and edited the final manuscript; N.S. made the graphical presentations and wrote parts of the manuscript: T.M., L.N., N.S., S.L., P.P.C., R.S. and A.T.M. validated data and results and contributed to critical review and redrafting of the manuscript.
